text: So fetching the fields is not necessary? But it is probably best to fetch the ID from the meta.json right?
The ID is fetched, but I want to fetch the meta.json from the portal when changes happen, so I have a `watch` set on the meta.json.
So I first fetch the meta.json so I have the ID and then sync the meta.json back to the portal.
Could it be that the problem with overwriting global content has something to do with an outdated CLI?
I do the same for the fields. I retrieve the fields from the portal, take the `"id"` and `"defaults"` from the content and add those to my local json.
